channel.title: Linux Ricing Resources [WIKI]
channel.description:
# **Tiling Window Managers** #### X11 * [bspwm](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Bspwm) (_personal choice_) * [Openbox](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Openbox) * [Awesome](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Awesome) * [i3](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/I3) * [QTile](http://www.qtile.org/) * [herbstluftwm](http://www.herbstluftwm.org/) * [howm](https://github.com/HarveyHunt/howm) * [dwm](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Dwm) * [xmonad](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Xmonad) * [FVWM](http://www.fvwm.org/) * [StumpWM](https://stumpwm.github.io/) #### Wayland * [velox](https://github.com/michaelforney/velox) * [sway](https://github.com/SirCmpwn/sway) * [bspwc](https://github.com/Bl4ckb0ne/bspwc)
# **Stand-Alone Tiling Software** * [PyTile](https://github.com/BurntSushi/pytyle3)
# **Bars / Panels** * [candybar](https://github.com/Lokaltog/candybar) (_person choice_) * [dzen](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Dzen) * [lemonbar](https://github.com/LemonBoy/bar) * [tint2](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Tint2) * [n30f](https://github.com/sdhand/n30f) * [polybar](https://github.com/jaagr/polybar)
# **Program Launchers** * [rofi](https://github.com/DaveDavenport/rofi) (_personal choice_) * [dmenu](http://tools.suckless.org/dmenu/) * [dmenu2](https://bitbucket.org/melek/dmenu2) * [bemenu](https://github.com/Cloudef/bemenu) * [lighthouse](https://github.com/emgram769/lighthouse) * [interrobang](https://github.com/TrilbyWhite/interrobang) * [thinglaunch](http://git.r-36.net/thinglaunch/) * [xlunch](https://github.com/Tomas-M/xlunch)
# **Terminal Emulators** * [termite](https://github.com/thestinger/termite) (_personal choice_) * [urxvt](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Rxvt-unicode) * [st](http://st.suckless.org/) * [terminator](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Terminator) * [LXTerminal](https://wiki.lxde.org/en/LXTerminal) * [xfce-terminal](http://docs.xfce.org/apps/terminal/start) * [cool-retro-term](https://github.com/Swordfish90/cool-retro-term) * [kitty](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/) * [alacritty](https://github.com/jwilm/alacritty)
# **Color Schemes** * [terminal.sexy](http://terminal.sexy/) * [dotshare.it](http://dotshare.it/category/terms/colors) * [daylerees](http://daylerees.github.io/) * [coolors.co](http://coolors.co/) * [paletton](http://paletton.com/) * [colourlover](http://www.colourlovers.com/) * [materialpalette](http://www.materialpalette.com/) * [transparenttextures](http://www.transparenttextures.com/) * [imagecolorpicker](http://www.imagecolorpicker.com/) * [pltts](http://pltts.me/) * [image-color](https://image-color.com/)
# **Wallpapers** * [wallhaven](http://alpha.wallhaven.cc/) * [flickr](https://www.flickr.com/) * [deviantart](https://deviantart.com/) * [simpledesktops](http://simpledesktops.com/) * [subtlepatterns](http://subtlepatterns.com/) * [unsplash](https://unsplash.com/) * [nik](https://nik.bot.nu/browse.html) * [stripegenerator](http://www.stripegenerator.com/) * [tartanmaker](http://www.tartanmaker.com/) * [gratisgraphy](http://gratisography.com/) * [thepatternlibrary](http://thepatternlibrary.com/) * [duncjo01's archive](http://cs.gettysburg.edu/~duncjo01/archive/patterns/) * [bgrepeat](http://bgrepeat.com/)
# **Fonts**
* [DaFont](http://www.dafont.com/) * [codeface](https://github.com/chrissimpkins/codeface)
#### Vector * [Font-Awesome](http://fontawesome.io/) * [Ionicons](http://ionicons.com/) * [Google-Fonts](https://fonts.google.com/)
#### Bitmap * [bitmap-fonts](https://github.com/Tecate/bitmap-fonts) * [artwiz](https://github.com/whitelynx/artwiz-fonts-wl) * [eti's fonts](https://github.com/eti0/fonts)
# **System Info** * [neofetch](https://github.com/dylanaraps/neofetch) * [screenfetch](https://github.com/KittyKatt/screenFetch) * [archey](https://github.com/djmelik/archey) * [ufetch](https://gitlab.com/jschx/ufetch)
